statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE id = 10 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE page_visited = 'HomePage' OR ip_address = '192.168.0.1' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_table WHERE website_id = 1 AND visitor_id = 100;
DELETE FROM user_behavior_table WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 OR interaction_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE id = 100 AND page_url = '/home' AND visitor_id = 50;
DELETE FROM shopping_experience WHERE user_id = 200 AND cart_total > 100.00 AND purchase_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE user_id = 100 AND product_id = 'e38d774d-2e56-4cf4-8256-1622edcb8059';
